title: Why Is Unit 142857 Sad?: or The Tin Man's Heart
description: This is the first book in The Rational Series. The story is about a robot who achieved consciousness at 3:34 pm and fell in love by 4:00 pm with Ellen, a brilliant and beautiful woman from the team that had programmed the robot. The story spans eons and worlds as the Tin Man tries to work out love's algorithm while attempting to survive its throes.
author: Mike Stone
